entries: You grew up in northern Brevoy, but the call for heroes willing to help take back your country's rightful holdings in the Stolen Lands has inflamed your dreams of profit and possibilities, and you have joined an expedition journeying south.
Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Dexterity or Intelligence, and one is a free ability boost.
You're trained in the {@skill Society} skill and the {@skill Lore||Legal Lore} skill. You gain the {@feat Streetwise} skill feat.
